LanguageData.ADE_AdvancedSettingTooltip: Allows finer control over all the variables. Use at your own risk
LanguageData.ADE_DivideByZeroError: Please raise the efficiency, computers don't like dividing by 0!
LanguageData.ADE_PowerDrawSettingTooltip: Controls how much power the extractor draws at 100% power
LanguageData.ADE_MaxDeuteriumSettingTooltip: Controls how much deuterium the extractor is able to store internally
LanguageData.ADE_MaxWaterSettingTooltip: Controls how much water the extractor is able to store internally
LanguageData.ADE_WaterPerDaySettingTooltip: Controls how much water the extractor processes every day at 100% power
LanguageData.ADE_DeuteriumPerDaySettingTooltip: Controls how much deuterium the extractor produces every day at 100% power
LanguageData.ADE_EfficiencySettingTooltip: Controls how much deuterium one liter of water yields
LanguageData.ADE_WaterPerTickSetting: Water per Tick (~{0} L per day)
LanguageData.ADE_WaterPerTickSettingTooltip: Controls how much water the extractor tries to process per tick at 100% power, regardless of the efficiency
LanguageData.ADE_ToleranceAdvancedSettingTooltip: If the total amount of fluids processed per tick falls below, or if there's less water/space for deuterium in the internal tank than this value, the extractor will set its power draw to 0. Increase/decrease this if it mistakenly does so
LanguageData.ADE_DeuteriumPerDayAdvancedSettingToolti: Indicates how much deuterium the extractor outputs at 100% power with the current settings
LanguageData.ADE_EfficiencySlider: Power Level: {0}% | Daily processing rates:\nWater: {1} L\nDeuterium: {2}
LanguageData.ADE_PowerLevelGizmoDescription: Set the power level. Lower values decrease power consumption, but also slow down production
